column6: What is the legal age of marriage for girls?
column7: Are there any exceptions to the legal age of marriage?
column8: Is marriage under the legal age void or explicitly prohibited?
column9: Are there penalties for authorizing or entering into child or early marriage?
column10: Is there legislation that specifically addresses sexual harassment?
column11: Does the legislation establish clear criminal penalties for domestic violence?
column12: Is there a specialized court or procedure for cases of domestic violence?
column13: Can a woman obtain a national identity card in the same way as a married man?
column14: Can a married woman legally confer citizenship to her children in the same way as a married man?
column15: Can an unmarried woman legally confer citizenship to her children in the same way as a married man?
column16: Can a married woman legally confer her citizenship to a non-national spouse in the same way as a married man?
column17: Do married couples jointly share legal responsibility for financially maintaining the family’s expenses?
column18: Does a woman’s testimony carry the same evidentiary weight in court as a man's in all types of cases?
column19: Is customary law a valid source of law under the constitution?
column20: If customary law is a valid source of law under the constitution, is it considered invalid if it violates constitutional provisions on nondiscrimination or equality?
